column4: Hi. I have an ASUS g75-vw. Installed ubuntu from the 'try ubuntu before installing' option. Problem is just when Ubuntu is about to start, the screen goes all fuzzy and nothing can be seen except weird colors. HOWEVER if I load recovery mode, and click 'continue to boot normally' I can see everything just fine. I installed the latest Nvidia drivers like this, but the problem still persists. Any ideas what I sohuld do?
I suspect the "try" ubuntu is falling back to the vesa drivers
then your normal boot is trying to configure nvidia/3rd party xorg drivers which dont work on your card (at a guess)
how do you know it's using nvidia at that point /
